privacyPolicy.locationServicesNote2: Location data is NOT stored after trip completion

privacyPolicy.infoDeviceDesc: Device type, OS version for app optimization
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityDesc: All data transmission is encrypted using HTTPS/TLS. Your data is stored on secure Supabase servers with industry-standard security measures including encryption at rest, role-based access control, and regular security audits.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyNote: Each service operates under their own privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionDesc: Booking data retained for 2 years for legal/tax purposes. Location data deleted immediately after trip completion. You may request data deletion at any time.
privacyPolicy.policyUpdatesDesc: We may update this policy periodically. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
